--- select_singer_with_root_parent.sql
( SELECT * FROM Singers )

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.SubQueryExpr{
    end:  25,
    Expr: &parser.SubQuery{
      pos:  0,
      end:  25,
      Expr: &parser.Select{
        pos:      2,
        end:      23,
        Distinct: false,
        AsStruct: false,
        List:     parser.SelectExprList{
          &parser.SelectExpr{
            pos:  9,
            end:  10,
            Expr: nil,
            Star: true,
            As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
          },
        },
        From: parser.FromItemList{
          &parser.FromItem{
            end:  23,
            Expr: &parser.TableName{
              end:   23,
              Ident: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  16,
                end:  23,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
              Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
              As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
            },
            Method: "",
            Num:    nil,
            Rows:   false,
          },
        },
        Where:   nil,
        GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
        Having:  nil,
        OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
        Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
      },
    },
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT * FROM Singers)
